title: 'Not at all warm'
body: It's feels like second hand wools deficit of any warmth what so ever. If u buying for warmth don't go ahead buy a jacket instead if u looking for fashion n looks order a size 2 size smaller than urs.

title: 'Good Value for Money'
body: The sweater looks smart and feels good. The only negative I can point out is that it's a bit too thin. Overall it's good value for money.

title: 'Good for moderate winters'
body: 'Lightweight. Good for use in moderate cold or as sleepwear.'

title: 'Average'
body: 'Just an average sweater very light and okay for moderate winters.'

title: 'QUALITY OF THE PRODUCT'
body: 'The material is too thin to provide warmth for severe winters...the quality needs to be improved.'
